control.name: cbTransitionType
control.description: Allows selection of the current transition animation type.

control.name: cbEasingMode
control.description: This option allows you to select a value that specifies how animation interpolates. Specifies the animation segment starting from which the EasingFunction is applied.

control.name: cbEasingFunction
control.description: Specifies a function used to calculate the currently selected transition animation type. Affects the transition animation smoothness and speed.

control.name: cbShowWaitIndicator
control.description: Specifies whether the wait indicator should be visible during the layout re-arrangement before animation starts.

control.name: seFrameCount
control.description: Allows you to manually select the number of frames used within the current transition animation. High frames amount improves the animation quality but can affect the performance.

control.name: cbEffectOptions
control.description: Stores additional options for the currently selected animation type (e.g. the animation direction).

control.name: ceBackground
control.description: Sets the background color used only for the SlideFade transition type.

control.name: seStripeCount
control.description: Allows you to specify the number of stripes the Comb transition type animation will use.

control.name: checkVertical
control.description: Specifies whether the Comb transition animation should use vertical or horizontal stripes.

control.name: checkInward
control.description: Specifies whether the current or subsequent content should be divided into stripes when the Comb transition type animation is played.

control.name: checkUnCover
control.description: Specifies whether the current or subsequent content should be used as an upper layer in the Cover transition type animation.
